content: Hi all,I want to create a profile for length of stay of a patient. In this profile i want to capture the date of admission of patient,possible discharge,actual discharge,geometric mean of length of stay,unavailable days.Thank you
This sounds like the duration property on encounter, in conjunction with the status history properties.(which will tell you when they were active, or unavailable/on leave etc)
@Brian Postlethwaite Can you explain the process in detail
